prompt.task: Analyze the image in a PDF to determine its type and provide a description.
prompt.instructions: 1. Extract the image from the PDF. 2. Identify the type of image (e.g., photograph, diagram, chart, scanned document). 3. Generate a detailed description of the image's content.
prompt.output: Image Type: [Photograph/Diagram/Chart/Scanned Document/etc.] Description: [Detailed description of the image]
